We bring ideas to life through tailored digital solutions, including web development, brand identity, and 3D visualization.

ABOUT

We possess extensive expertise in UI/UX design, development, and 3D modeling, enabling us to craft solutions that are not only visually engaging but also intuitive and aligned with business objectives. Every project is approached individually, with full-cycle involvement to ensure all client requirements and expectations are met.
Our work goes beyond website design — we build digital experiences that capture attention and foster trust. By seamlessly integrating aesthetics with functionality, we ensure each solution authentically represents the client’s vision and values.

OUR SERVICES

We build websites that will showcase your brand and services.

The price of creating a website depends on many factors, including:

  • Project type - landing page, corporate website or online store;
  • Complexity of the functionality used;
  • The need for SEO optimization at the development stage;
  • The size of the site and amount of content;
  • Development time frame;
  • Complexity of design solutions and UI/UX;
  • Ammount of support needed after end of the project.

Thus, the price of creating a website is determined individually and is based on the specifications and development goals.

STAGES OF WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT

01. UX: at this stage, we determine the goals and requirements for the website, conduct an analysis of competitors and the target audience, and determine the main sections and functionality of the site.
02. Design: we create the site structure and its visual design. The layout of each page is designed keeping user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) in mind.
03. Development: at this stage, programmers begin to create the code that turns the site design into a working website.
04. Testing: once development is complete, the website is tested on various devices and browsers to ensure it works correctly. Identified errors are corrected.
05. Launch: after successful completion of testing, the website is ready to launch and publish. It is hosted and made available to users.

PROJECTS

FINANCE LABS

Branding
Brand development for the newly established company, Finance Labs, operating in the financial sector. The project involved designing an attractive logo, selecting color and font options, and creating comprehensive style guidelines presented in a brand book. Additionally, invoice and email signature templates were developed and delivered as part of the branding package.

VIABON

Branding, website
For the company ViaBON, working in the financial sector, a holistic visual style was developed: corporate colors and fonts were selected, a brand book with recommendations for using the identity was created. At the moment, work is underway on a corporate website with adaptation for various devices.

5W

Branding, website
Development of a corporate identity for a new financial company 5W: a logo was created, a color palette and typography were defined, a brand book was designed. A website with an adaptive design optimized for all types of devices was also developed. The website is designed in accordance with the corporate identity and is focused on simple and clear navigation.

Display More

Branding, website
Logo development, creation of an online store in Webflow for selling dog accessories. The main goals of the project:
  • User-friendly interface: creating an intuitive design for comfortable searching and purchasing of goods.
  • Quality content: filling the site with useful information about products, their characteristics.
  • Visual: implementation of animation elements to improve user experience, create an attractive visual design and retain the attention of visitors.
  • Secure payments: providing a reliable system of payment and delivery of goods.
At the moment, the site is still under development.

PENA LAB

Branding
Development of a logo and brand book (including color palette, typography, icons and graphic elements), creation of a corporate identity (business cards, advertising posters, packaging, templates for presentations and social networks), as well as video and animation materials, landing page for the creative studio Pena Lab. The task was to harmoniously combine the brand concept with minimalist "trash" aesthetics, without losing the main idea of ​​ephemeral art and conscious consumption. The essence of the concept: 'You wear a thing for the sake of a unique name, and then it disappears.'
Logo, website design rebranding
Website rebranding for a company which develops LED screens, media facades and bus stops. We created a logo, website design in Shopify, 3D models of pylons and bus stops, configurator, banners and animations for the website.
Design: the color palette was used with the addition of dark shades to highlight the brightness and contrast of the LED screens. Added gradients, glow and backlight effects to create the appearance of glowing panels. A modern and clean font has been used to ensure that the text is easy to read against the bright background of the LED screens.
3D Modeling
3D Modeling
Development of 3D models for Palami to showcase a variety of products. The project required creating two distinct bus stop designs, each available in four sizes and offering numerous configuration options. These options included the number of screens, availability of a map, schedule display, and custom city prints on the glass. Additionally, the pylon model was a faithful recreation of one of their existing physical products.

MÜLLER'S

Logo, business cards
Development of a logo and business cards for a sweet workshop in Latvia. At the request of the customer, the logo should be elegant and minimalistic, with a certain emphasis in the color palette
Design: the logo for the sweet workshop was designed to be attractive and creative. Readable and stylish font and contrasting red color, which reflects the degree of premium and quality of the product. A calligraphic element was used to add a touch of sophistication.

REALWIN

Logo
The RealWin logo for an online casino is a key element of the project's visual identity. It is designed keeping in mind the goals and values ​​of the project, as well as taking into account the requirements of the target audience. The logo reflects the uniqueness and character of the project, creating a recognizable and memorable image.

ECCA

Logo
Electric vehicle logo design and UX. The logo attracts the attention of potential customers and highlights the benefits of electric vehicles, such as environmental sustainability and advanced technology. Main project goals:
  • Unique design: reflection of technological progress and an innovative approach in the logo design.
  • Sustainability: visual elements that symbolize care for nature and sustainable development.
  • Multifunctionality: the logo should be adapted for use on various media, including cars, advertising materials and websites.
  • Simplicity and memorability: the design should be easy to perceive and remember so that customers can easily identify the brand.

MAJA

Branding
The project aims to create a visual element that will become part of the brand and will be associated with the quality and comfort of Maja Coffee House. The logo is stylish, modern and easily recognizable to attract customers attention and ensure the quality of the services offered. The main goals of the project:
  • Uniqueness: creating an original design that will distinguish Maja Coffee House from its competitors.
  • Multifunctionality: the design should look good on various media: from the sign to packaging and merchandise.
  • Color palette: choosing a harmonious color scheme that creates a cozy and attractive impression.
  • Ease of perception: the logo should be simple and easy to remember so that customers can easily identify it.

DASHBOARD

Concept
Automobile dashboard UI design with user-friendly and modern interface. Car dashboard user experience concept. As electrification and software functions evolve, we believe there is a need for rethinking and simplicity, moving away from classic setups and moving towards a more passenger-oriented experience.

SOA

Branding, website
A holistic visual style was developed for Soa Skincare, a company specializing in the sale of skincare cosmetics: corporate colors, typography, and graphic elements reflecting the brand values were selected. A brand book was created with detailed recommendations on the use of identity in digital and printed materials. A line for the production of cosmetics was also developed, combining aesthetics and functionality. Currently, work is underway to create a single website with adaptation for all standard devices.
